response:
Here are 50 short story prompts in a Python list:

```python
short_story_prompts = [
    "A mysterious box arrives at your doorstep with no return address.",
    "You wake up one morning to find that you can fly.",
    "A group of friends on a camping trip discover a hidden underground bunker.",
    "You are the last person on earth, and you must find a way to survive.",
    "A magical artifact grants you immense power, but at a terrible cost.",
    "You are given the ability to time travel, but only to relive the same day over and over.",
    "A stranger approaches you on the street and hands you a cryptic message.",
    "You are shrunk down to the size of a mouse and must navigate your way through a treacherous household.",
    "A group of friends discover a portal to another dimension in their backyard.",
    "You are tasked with solving a murder mystery that took place in a small town with a dark secret.",
    "A robot uprising occurs, and you must find a way to stop the machines before they take over the world.",
    "You are given the ability to shapeshift into any animal, but you must learn to control your new powers.",
    "A group of friends on a road trip stumble upon a mysterious town that seems to be stuck in the past.",
    "You are trapped in a never-ending loop of dreams, and you must find a way to wake up.",
    "A powerful corporation offers you a chance to become immortal, but at a steep price.",
    "You are the captain of a spaceship that has been stranded on a deserted! planet.",
    "A group of friends discover a hidden treasure map that leads them on a perilous adventure.",
    "You are tasked with protecting a powerful artifact from falling into the wrong hands.",
    "A stranger approaches you and claims to be your future self, warning you of an impending disaster.",
    "You are given the ability to read minds, but you soon realize that it's a curse rather than a blessing.",
    "A group of friends are trapped in a haunted mansion, and they must find a way to escape.",
    "You are the last hope for humanity as a deadly virus spreads across the globe.",
    "A mysterious figure is stalking you, and you must find a way to uncover their identity.",
    "You are tasked with solving a puzzle that has been left behind by a deceased loved one.",
    "A group of friends discover a secret society that has been hiding in plain sight.",
    "You are given the ability to communicate with the dead, but you soon realize that it comes with a terrible cost.",
    "A powerful alien species offers to make contact with humanity, but their intentions are unclear.",
    "You are trapped in a virtual reality world, and you must find a way to escape.",
    "A group of friends are tasked with stopping a catastrophic event that will destroy the world.",
    "You are the only one who can see the ghosts that haunt a small town.",
    "A mysterious illness is sweeping the nation, and you must find a cure before it's too late.",
    "You are given the ability to manipulate time, but you soon realize that it's a delicate power.",
    "A group of friends discover a hidden world beneath their city, where strange creatures lurk.",
    "You are tasked with uncovering a conspiracy that threatens to destroy the government.",
    "A stranger approaches you and offers to grant you a single wish, but at a steep price.",
    "You are the captain of a submarine that has been damaged in a storm, and you must find a way to survive.",
    "A group of friends are trapped in a never-ending storm, and they must find a way to escape.",
    "You are given the ability to see the future, but you soon realize that it's a curse rather than a blessing.",
    "A mysterious figure is manipulating events from behind the scenes, and you must uncover their identity.",
    "You are tasked with solving a mystery that has been left behind by a famous detective.",
    "A group of friends discover a hidden journal that holds the secrets of a small town.",
    "You are the only one who can stop a powerful villain from taking over the world.",
    "A mysterious event occurs that causes all technology to fail, and you must find a way to survive.",
    "You are given the ability to heal any wound, but you soon realize that it comes with a terrible cost.",
    "A group of friends are trapped in a maze with no exit, and they must find a way to escape.",
    "You are tasked with uncovering a dark secret that has been hidden for decades.",
    "A stranger approaches you and claims to have information about your missing loved one.",
    "You are the last hope for a small town that is being threatened by a powerful corporation.",
    "A group of friends discover a hidden underground city, where they must navigate the dangers of the unknown.",
    "You are given the ability to control the elements, but you soon realize that it's a delicate power.",
    "A mysterious figure is stalking you, and you must find a way to uncover their identity and stop them."
]
```

These prompts cover a wide range of genres and themes, from science fiction and fantasy to mystery and horror. You can use them to generate short stories, or as inspiration for your own writing projects.
